      • addCity

        public static void addCity(City city)
                    throws SameCityException
        Adds a new city to the already existing list. Does not allow same city additions.
        Parameters:
        city - the city as an object
        Throws:
        SameCityException - when the user tries to add the same city twice.

      • getCityByName

        public static City getCityByName(java.lang.String name)
        Iterates through all the cities and returns the matching city.
        Parameters:
        name - The name, it is searching from.
        Returns:
        The city as an object, when the names match.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the BasicUser.
        city - The city he/she has visited.

      • getUserByName

        public static User getUserByName(java.lang.String name)
        Iterates through all the users and returns the matching user.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the user we are searching for.
        Returns:
        The user as an object.

        Finds a city by name and removes it
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        if the removal is successful or not.
